name: Flappy Bird in extra beautiful world
name_original: Flappy Bird in extra beautiful world
description:
Hello, this simple game can brighten up a few days of your life. 

In the beginning, you need to finish easy maps. Survive only twenty seconds to move on to hard maps, and then to extra hard maps.

If you fall or crash, your score will be saved and increased. Try to keep it as low as you can.  

After passing the extra hard maps, you can change the skin of the bird and try to beat the second level. 

The game has only two levels. You must complete both of them to unlock the new mode. Improve your results! 

You can return to this page another day, your progress will be saved.
